alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 1:41PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Chesterfield County through 215 PM EDT... At 141 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chesterfield, or 15 miles west of Cheraw, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chesterfield, Carolina Sandhills Wildlife Refuge, Ruby, Mount Croghan, Chesterfield Ruby Middle School, Bay Springs Fire Station and Chesterfield Detention Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
